تعديل: بسبب أسباب فنية تم تعديل ال URL الخاص بالمقال، ليصبح:
http://ahmed.mozaly.com/2016/11/Rahawan.html
-------------
صباح الفل،
ده مقال كتبته بتكلم فيه لأول مرة عن "رهوان" وهو كان -لغاية النهارده الصبح :)- مشروع داخلي في الشركة عندنا
بتكلم فيه عن ازاي قدرنا نحسن ال Response Time بتاع مواقع الويب اللي بنطورها
هي بطاقات البنك الأهلي للشباب وكريدي اجريكول بتنفع مع باي بال؟ يعني ينفع استقبل فلوس من بره مصر على باي بال؟ ولا لازم حساب في البنك علشان اقدر استقبل على فلوس على باي بال؟

شباب
I was certified as MCPD in 2011 but I can't remember that old MCP account email and password and I only have my MC ID and certification number 
حد مر بالمشكله دي سابقا

ملخص الكورس المجاني:
Building High Conversion Web Forms
posts.description:
Building High Conversion Web Forms -- Free Course from Udacity
----------------
* Summary
1- Use HTML5 2- Mobile-first design
* Longer summary
* forms design principles
1- short and sweet = avoid redundancy, auto-fill as much as possible,..etc
2- provide helpful prompts = labels, placeholders,..etc
3- provide immediate feedback = validation, current progress "wizard"
* another 4 rules:
1- keep: mandatory fields
2- cut: irrelevant info
3- postpone: anything you can get later
4- explain: why you need this info? how to answer this question?
* some tricks
- use datalists instead of dropdowns
- don't ask the user for info he entered before
- allow save the form and continue later, may be from other device
- allow shopping without pre-registration, make registration last
- deduce address/location from geolocation api
- Can the user fill the form on the mobile with his thumb?
* good resources:
http://www.slideshare.net/greenido/web-forms-the-right-way
http://labs.udacity.com/images/web-forms-checklist.pdf

posts.message: Dear experienced front-end/UI developers I got the chance to work on huge project so everything I do is count. So I decided to follow CSS architecture with preprocessor. I have decided a Sass for the preprocessor but still try to find the best architecture that goes well with it. I did my research and I found that there are  2 or 3 or combination from them (BEM - SMACSS - rscss). Anyone suggest anything from his previous experience or a guideline you are very welcome.
